body:
So this video has a space theme with missions that I have to complete. Although I fail a few, it is still a fun adventure!  Also, this video highlights some chest and ore locations on the Mesoplanet walls map. 
Thanks for watching and supporting my channel!
http://youtu.be/N5HjkgB-830

replies.body: Nice video Murph! One of my favorite David Bowie songs at the start o:
replies.body_tagged: Nice video Murph! One of my favorite David Bowie songs at the start o:

replies.body:
Thanks so much!! Space Oddity by David Bowie is a classic.

Can I have some feedback on items that I missed on this map?   I only got ...
* space helmet
* teleportation shoes
* fortune iron pick
* energy bar (blaze rod)
* mid bow

I know there are more items.  I can re-edit the video with more info.
Thanks!!! : )
